summary: Test suite for the Kandinsky image-to-image diffusion pipeline, providing fast unit tests with mocked components, full integration tests using real models, and nightly regression tests. The tests verify output formats, image generation quality, deterministic behavior, and resource offloading.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and performance of the Kandinsky Img2Img generation pipeline across development, continuous integration, and nightly validation, preventing regressions and ensuring reliable deployment.
